Customer Service / Admin Job at Natafamdavid Consulting Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Natafamdavid Consulting Nigeria Limited is a business growth consultancy company offering tailor made services targeted at building profitable and productive companies with a focus on building sustainable enterprises, comprehensive HR advisory services, brand growth, corporate governance, business strategy and advisory services at different sections of the value chain.

Our services are across-the-board and we are driven by a strong passion to create value for our clients. From the het go, we set out to work with clients across diverse industries, providing strategic solutions to increase our success matrix, productivity, profitability.
     

            
    



So far, we have worked with clients in different industries and sectors such as Agriculture, Real Estate, Hospitality, Engineering & Construction, Education, Logistics, Health & Environment, Oil & gas, Retail and more, to achieve their itemized objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service / Admin

Job Location: Maryland, Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Serve as the first point of contact for clients via phone, email, and in person.
	Respond to customer inquiries and complaints professionally and promptly.
	Schedule appointments, site visits, and service requests.
	Maintain accurate customer records and documentation.
	Prepare quotations, invoices, and basic reports.
	Support the operations and technical teams with administrative tasks.
	Manage office files, correspondence, and records.
	Ensure smooth day-to-day office operations.
	Follow up with clients to ensure satisfaction and service delivery.


Requirements


	HND/B.Sc. in Business Administration, Office Management, Mass Communication, or related field.
	Proven experience in customer service or administrative roles.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Outlook).
	Good customer handling and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work independently and under minimal supervision.
	Experience in an engineering or technical environment is an added advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: nadrecruitmentng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "Senior Project Engineer / Project Manager",
  "description": "At Peakhire, we connect organizations with skilled candidates who fit your culture and goals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Project Engineer / Project Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Head of Projects / Operations Director

Job Summary


	Responsible for planning, executing, and delivering Oil &amp; Gas projects within scope, budget, and timeline while ensuring safety, quality, and compliance.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, execute, monitor, and close projects end-to-end
	Develop schedules, budgets, and risk management plans
	Coordinate engineering teams, contractors, and vendors
	Ensure HSE and regulatory compliance
	Track performance, manage risks, and report project status
	Manage contractors, contracts, and project deliverables.


Requirements


	B.Sc. in Engineering (Mechanical, Electrical, Civil, or related)
